```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
library(childeswordfreq)
```

# Quick start

This shows a basic example of how to run the function.

word_file <- system.file("extdata", "word_list.csv", package = "childeswordfreq")
out_file  <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx")

word_counts(
  word_list_file = word_file,
  output_file    = out_file,
  language       = "eng",
  age            = c(18, 36)
)

# Wildcards and POS

This example shows extra options you can use.

words <- tempfile(fileext = ".csv")
write.csv(data.frame(word = c("go", "run%", "play_", "the")), words, row.names = FALSE)

out_file <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx")
word_counts(
  word_list_file  = words,
  output_file     = out_file,
  language        = "eng",
  age             = c(18, 36),
  wildcard        = TRUE,
  collapse        = "stem",
  part_of_speech  = c("v"),
  include_context = TRUE,
  window          = c(1, 1)
)
